text: Nature to be commanded must be obeyed.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Love, and do what you will.
author: Augustine

text: Nothing in life is as important as you think it is, while you are thinking about it.
author: Daniel Kahneman

text: Freedom discovers man the moment he loses concern over what impression he is making or about to make.
author: Bruce Lee

text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

text: You always own the option of having no opinion.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: We go in the mental frame of adventure, aggressiveness, and zeal. Thus does fear vanish and the ghosts become creatures of mind-weft; thus does our elan burst the under-earth terror.
